urls.title: Youth Voice Summit - Rethinking Water
urls.description: A chance for you to input your opinions and experiences on future water management and how you would like to engage in giving your opinion in the decisions made by the Environment Agency in the future.

tweets.text: COMPLETELY LEGAL? Not so - To quote the @EnvAgency  @JamesBevanEA  'Discharges of untreated sewage due to groundwater infiltration alone are not permitted.'‚Äô  Despite their devastating effects they are mainly ignored and here's why https://t.co/bQJZQdMaB9 https://t.co/DvL6Af8Fzt

....the owner sold it to the current owner for ¬£250 in 2018, who renamed it 'Broke but Afloat'. It is now 'Broke but Definitely not Afloat'. The vessel, was of course, unregistered and uninsured, but the @EnvAgencySE  and @RBKingston powerless to take action.

Are you a sciences student interested in the environment and lab work?

Come along to this insight event on 17 March with @EnvAgency and the National Laboratory Service for information and networking with both recent graduates and senior colleagues üå≥

https://t.co/qW1vBA4bqm https://t.co/g2XxPitpkL

We want to ensure water companies provide a sustainable supply of water to their customers, while protecting and enhancing the environment.

We've published guidelines for water companies to use for their water resources management plans.

Read them here: https://t.co/w60et6JxQ1 https://t.co/02C4xH5X65

üö® This is not an isolated incident üö® It is completely legal for water companies to discharge raw sewage into rivers. From popular swimming spots to rare chalk streams, NO RIVER IS SAFE. 
https://t.co/TuRl8NKUvp

tweets.text:
Good morning

King's Sedgemoor Drain looking super low again yesterday - just seen @AdrianGovierEA's post re flow monitoring equipment being installed @waterlevels n.b.  @EnvAgencySW there is still a hazard - looks like handrail -protruding from one of the footbridge bases. https://t.co/8O53uuxSgH

We're asking our members who have been impacted by large-scale waste crime to take part in the @EnvAgency's National Waste Crime Survey 2021. You have until the 22 March to have your say. Visit NFU Online for further details üëâ https://t.co/5lQzDPg2IU https://t.co/06vC4DnTTG

urls.title: Get involved in the National Waste Crime Survey 2021
urls.description: Farmers impacted by large-scale waste crime are being urged to give their views through a new survey which will aid the fight against criminal activity.

@theriverstrust @EsmeeFairbairn @EnvAgencyNW @floodre @unitedutilities @coopukinsurance @triodosuk https://t.co/dXYpZkjV9B

@EnvAgencyMids The Council received more than 2,000 complaints about the odour at the weekend. We had officers out on the ground monitoring the situation and evidencing residents‚Äô complaints until well past midnight on Saturday. We have colleagues living across the borough üëá https://t.co/23UEiA70Su
This is a big part of Britain‚Äôs litter problem.  Chronic lack of enforcement of laws by @EnvAgency and @HighwaysEngland @BBCJustinR https://t.co/Qv6ISawY9f

@Sotlive @piersmorgan @GMB So the EA put monitoring equipment in place to monitor the stink coming from Walley's Quarry Landfill. The weekend passes and we see record complaints about the landfill. Now the @EnvAgencyMids claim the testing equipment was not switched on. Convenient

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.
